innerText: Dhammapaccanīyānulome dukapaṭṭhānaṃ
1-6. Hetugocchakaṃ
1-7. Paṭiccavārādi

children: . Nahetuṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 1. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

children: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate nava.
innerText: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate nava.
(Sahajātavārampi…pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

children: . Nasahetukaṃ

dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 2. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.

children: Naahetukaṃ

dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.

Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā
nava.
innerText: 3. Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 4. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 5. Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 6. Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
7-13. Cūḷantaradukādi

children: . Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ.
innerText: 7. Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ.

children: . Naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā
ekaṃ.
innerText: 8. Naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ.

children: . Nasanidassanaṃ

dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi.
innerText: 9. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi.

children: Nasanidassano
dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.
innerText: Nasanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.
Nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

children: . Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ
paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 10. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.

Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 11. Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 12. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

children: Nalokiyañca
nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1). Hetuyā pañca.
innerText: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1). Hetuyā pañca.

children: . Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 13. Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
14-19. Āsavagocchakaṃ

children: . Naāsavaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 14. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.

Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 15. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
Naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ.
Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca.

children: . Naāsavasampayuttaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 16. Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 17. Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 18. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā pañca.
innerText: 19. Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā pañca.
20-54. Saññojanādichagocchakāni

children: . Nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…pe….
innerText: 20. Nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…pe….
Naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…pe….

children: Naoghaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
…pe….
innerText: Naoghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
Nayogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…pe….
Nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…

children: . Naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā….
innerText: 21. Naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā….
55-68. Mahantaradukādi

children: . Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 22. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.

children: Naanārammaṇaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.
innerText: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.
Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
innerText: 23. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
Nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ.

children: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
. Ekaṃ. Hetuyā pañca.
innerText: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . Ekaṃ. Hetuyā pañca.

children: . Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā nava.
innerText: 24. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 25. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

children: Nacittavippayuttaṃ

dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi. Hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 26. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 27. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 28. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittānuparivattiṃ

dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 29. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 30. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 31. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.
innerText: 32. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… hetuyā nava.

children: . Nadassanena

Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Tīṇi.
Nadassanena pahātabbañca nanadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ. Hetuyā pañca.

100. Saraṇadukaṃ
1-7. Paṭiccavārādi

children: . Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ.
innerText: 55. Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ.
Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.

children: Nasaraṇañca
naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ. Hetuyā
pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe… avigate pañca.
innerText: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ekaṃ. Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe… avigate pañca.
Paccanīyaṃ
Nahetupaccayo

children: . Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 56. Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi…pe… novigate tīṇi.
(Sahajātavārampi…pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
Hetu-ārammaṇapaccayā

children: . Nasaraṇo
dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
innerText: 57. Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

children: . Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Dve.
innerText: 58. Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Dve.
Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Dve.

children: . Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri…pe… avigate satta.
innerText: 59. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri…pe… avigate satta.
Paccanīyuddhāro

children: . Nasaraṇo
dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 60. Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: Nahetuyā
satta, naārammaṇe satta…pe… noavigate cattāri.
innerText: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta…pe… noavigate cattāri.
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
Dhammapaccanīyānulome dukapaṭṭhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
